edu.luc.etl.cs313.android.simplestopwatch.model.state

Interface TimerStateMachine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OnTickListener, TimerUIListener, TimerUIUpdateSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTimerStateMachine

    public interface TimerStateMachine
extends TimerUIListener, OnTickListener, TimerUIUpdateSource
    The state machine for the state-based dynamic model of the stopwatch. This interface is part of the State pattern.
